statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;

SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE grade_level > 8;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students;
SELECT MAX(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT MIN(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT AVG(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT SUM(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT student_id, grade_level FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM students LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level IN (9, 10, 11);
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%ll%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Bob' OR student_name = 'Charlie';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id NOT IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE grade_level < 5 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' OR student_name = 'Bob';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students;
SELECT AVG(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT SUM(grade_level) FROM students;
SELECT student_name, SUM(grade_level) AS total_grade FROM students GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) < 3;
SELECT student_name, MAX(grade_level) AS highest_grade FROM students GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, MIN(grade_level) AS lowest_grade FROM students GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade_level) AS average_grade FROM students GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level < (SELECT AVG(grade_level) FROM students);
SELECT student_name, grade_level, (SELECT MAX(grade_level) FROM students) AS max_grade FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY grade_level DESC) AS rank FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level, CASE WHEN grade_level >= 10 THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END AS result FROM students;
SELECT * FROM completed_assignments;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade FROM completed_assignments;
SELECT name FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name FROM students;
SELECT assignment_id, grade FROM completed_assignments;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id FROM completed_assignments;
SELECT * FROM completed_assignments WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT * FROM completed_assignments WHERE grade < 50;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, MIN(grade) AS lowest_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS num_students FROM students;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN completed_assignments ON students.student_id = completed_assignments.student_id;
SELECT students.name, completed_assignments.grade FROM students INNER JOIN completed_assignments ON students.student_id = completed_assignments.student_id;
SELECT students.name, completed_assignments.grade FROM students LEFT JOIN completed_assignments ON students.student_id = completed_assignments.student_id;
SELECT students.name, completed_assignments.grade FROM students RIGHT JOIN completed_assignments ON students.student_id = completed_assignments.student_id;
SELECT students.name, completed_assignments.grade FROM students FULL OUTER JOIN completed_assignments ON students.student_id = completed_assignments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id WHERE completed_assignments.grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id WHERE students.name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade > 70;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1 OR student_id = 2 OR student_id = 3;

SELECT student_id, name, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY highest_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade < 60;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id WHERE completed_assignments.grade = 100;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE name LIKE '%son%' OR name LIKE '%sen%';
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id WHERE completed_assignments.grade <= 70;
SELECT student_id, name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4);
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM completed_assignments JOIN students ON completed_assignments.student_id = students.student_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade < 90;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM completed_assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_assignments >= 5;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON assignments.assignment_id = grades.assignment_id GROUP BY student_name, assignment_name;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON assignments.assignment_id = grades.assignment_id GROUP BY student_name, assignment_name;

SELECT student_id, assignment_name FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND assignments.assignment_id = grades.assignment_id

SELECT students.student_id, students.student_name, AVG(grades.grade) AS average_grade FROM students LEFT JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id, students.student_name

SELECT assignments.assignment_id, assignments.assignment_name, COUNT(grades.student_id) AS num_students FROM assignments LEFT JOIN grades ON assignments.assignment_id = grades.assignment_id GROUP BY assignments.assignment_id, assignments.assignment_name
